name: Blink Bullet
description:
Blink Bullet is a top-down shooter with arcade-like gameplay with the mechanic of teleporting to your bullets whenever they hit anything. It has fast yet deliberate gameplay with several different enemy types that all play off one another.

It feels really nice to have finally gotten a game finished and published - and especially one made for a gamejam!

This game was made for the ScoreSpace Jam #11 with the theme of teleportation. A link and a version on Gamejam.com will appear hear as soon as possible!
